name: Asteroid (Arkanio)
description:
Asteroid is an arcade in early-access where the goal is to survive asteroids attacking your you have a total of 8 weapons.

[The Customization tab]

you can change your trails in this menu, change weapons and weapon type ( 0, 1, 2 cannons). there is 2 color to change (right click for 1st color and left click for 2nd color)

dev note : i'm still working and this is an Early Access so it's normal if there is bug so don't worry ! i will try to post updates weekly and if you have a bug/crash please send me the error message
